entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:13 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
